#include <iostream>
 
using namespace std;
 
const int WLIM = 10010;
const int CLIM = 510;
int INT_MAX = 1<<30; 
int p[CLIM], w[CLIM], m[WLIM];
 
int main()
{
int t, n, e, f;
int i,j;
int tmp, tmp1;
 
cin>>t;
 
while(t--) {
cin>>e>>f;
cin>>n;
 
tmp = INT_MAX;
 
for(i=1;i<=n;i++) {
cin>>p[i]>>w[i];
tmp = min(tmp, w[i]);
}
 
for(i=0;i<tmp;i++) m[i]=0;
 
for(i=tmp;i<=f-e;i++) {
tmp = INT_MAX;
for(j=1;j<=n;j++) {
tmp1 = 0;
if(i >= w[j])
if(m[i-w[j]] > 0 || i == w[j]) tmp1 = p[j] + m[i-w[j]];
if(tmp1 < tmp && tmp1!=0) tmp = tmp1;
}
 
if(tmp==INT_MAX) m[i] = 0;
else m[i] = tmp;
}
 
if(!m[f-e])
cout<<"This is impossible."<<endl;
else
cout<<"The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is "<<m[f-e]<<"."<<endl;
 
}
 
return 0;
}
